tool.name: DESeq

param.name: input1
param.label: Select an input matrix - rows are contigs, columns are counts for each sample
param.help: Use the DGE matrix preparation tool to create these matrices from BAM files and a BED file of contigs

param.name: jtitle
param.label: Title for job outputs
param.help: Supply a meaningful name here to remind you what the outputs contain

param.name: org
param.label: Contig name translation
param.help: Outputs can include gene names from (eg) mouse refseq ids or leave as None for no translation

validator.message: Please select at least one column.
Please select at least one column.

param.name: fQ
param.label: Non-specific contig count quantile (remove all below) threshold
param.help: May be a good or a bad idea. EG 0.3 = sparsest 30% contigs removed before analysis

param.name: fdrthresh
param.label: P value threshold for FDR filtering for amily wise error rate control

param.name: fdrtype
param.label: FDR (Type II error) control method
param.help: Use fdr or bh typically to control for the number of tests in a reliable way

tool.help:
**What it does**
Performes digital gene expression analysis between a treatment and control on a matrix.
**Input**
A matrix consisting of non-negative integers. The matrix must have a unique header row identifiying the samples, as well as a unique set of row names as the first column.
**Output**
A matrix which consists the original data and relative expression levels and some helpful plots
